Distractions Are Dangerous
description: Wiersbe shares on the phrase "looking unto Jesus." The Christian live begins and ends with looking unto Jesus. He shares the need to keep our eyes on God and avoid distractions that hinders us from walking by faith. The life of peter is shown in the 3 distractions that got his eyes off Jesus.

title: Four Wonderful Discoveries
description: This message was preached at the annual Pastor’s Conference, First Baptist Church Jacksonville, Florida, February 2, 1998. This message is a must hear for all Christian leaders who find that they are ministering in difficult days. In it, Dr. Wiersbe uncovers four wonderful discoveries (principles) that will help to refocus and encourage God’s leaders as they labor in the work of the Lord. God used this message to call me into the ministry and set me in the right path from the beginning. The Holy Spirit still reminds me of what He said to me through this sermon to this very day.

title: Get A Good Look At God
How Much Is Your-Bible Worth?
description: Expounds on the worth of the Word out of the longest chapter in the Bible by revealing the Psalmist's love and devotion to it over food, sleep, money, and friends. By cultivating this heart hungry for God's truth, we will reap the many benefits also found in the chapter.

description: A very good discussion at something like a pastor's conference where Wiersbe fields questions and gives answers based on his lifetime of ministry. An excellent discussion and profitable for anyone to listen to.

title: Salt-Light And Your World Conference Message
Seven Words From the Cross - Compassion
Seven Words From the Cross - Forgiveness
description: The last words of the Lord Jesus Christ on the cross are like windows into eternity of the heart and mind of God.  Warren shares four wonders of the first words: "Father, forgive them for they know not what they do."  There's the wonder of the address (Father), the wonder of the appeal (forgiveness), the wonder of the argument, and the wonder of the answer.
